hook.text: DeFi protocols gave users tokens that let them vote on how the protocol works. Governance became tradeable.

buildup.text: Tokens like UNI, AAVE, and COMP let holders vote on fee structures, upgrades, and treasury spending.

discovery.text: In theory, governance tokens make protocols democratic. Users shape the platform they use.

twist.text: In practice, voter participation is abysmal. Whales with large holdings dominate most governance votes.

climax.text: Governance tokens gave DeFi a democratic veneer. Whether it's real democracy or plutocracy is still debated.

punchline.text: Everyone got a vote. The biggest wallets decided everything.

quiz.question: What is a main criticism of DeFi governance tokens?
options: Whales with large holdings dominate most votes
